rukus.text: 23|33|(hutu napiyutaiya) makkalukku ivvulaka valkkaiyin cukapokankalai nam kotuttiruntum avarkalutaiya talaivarkal (avarraiyum) avaraiyum nirakarittuvittu marumaiyaic cantippataiyum poyyakki (‘hutu' napiyai cuttik kanpittu) ‘‘ivar unkalaip ponra oru manitane tavira verillai. Ninkal pucippataiye avarum pucikkirar; ninkal kutippataiye avarum kutikkirar
23|34|akave unkalaip ponra (im) manitanai ninkal pinparrinal niccayamaka ninkal nastame ataintuvituvirkal
23|35|ninkal irantu elumpakavum, mannakavum anatan pinnar niccayamaka ninkal (uyirutan) velippatuttappatuvirkal enru avar unkalai payamuruttukirara
23|36|avar unkalai payamuruttum visayam veku turamo turam (atu akakkutiyatanru)
23|37|Namakku ivvulaka valkkaiyait tavira veru valkkai illai. Itileye nam valntiruntu itileye irantuvituvom. (Itarkup pinnar uyir kotukkappattu) nam eluppappatap povatillai
23|38|(hutu napi ennum) im'manitar allahvin mitu poyyakak karpanai ceytu kurupavare tavira verillai. Ivarai nam nampave mattom'' enrarkal
23|39|atarkavar ‘‘en iraivane! Ivarkal ennaip poyyakki vittarkal. Nitan enakku utaviceyya ventum'' enru pirarttittar
23|40|atarku iraivan ‘‘(hute ciritu poruttirum!) Aticikkirattil ivarkal tukkattil alntu vituvarkal'' enru kurinan

23|41|akave (iti mulakkam ponra) oru captam meyyakave avarkalaip pitittuk kontatu. Nam avarkalai (alittuk) kuppaik kulankalaip pol akkivittom. Akave, aniyayakkara makkal mitu (iraivanin) capam erpattuvittatu
23|42|ivarkalukkup pinnarum marra vakuppinar palarai nam urpatti ceytom
23|43|(avarkalil enakku maruceyta) ovvoru vakupparum (avarkal alintupoka nam erpatuttiya) avarkalatu tavanaiyai muntavumillai; pintavumillai. (Cariyaka attavanaiyil alintu vittanar)

23|44|pinnarum nam tutarkalai oruvar pin oruvaraka nam anuppik konte iruntom. Oru vakupparitam avarkalutaiya tutar vantapotellam avarkal avaraip poyyakkik konte iruntarkal. Akave, namum (avvakuppinarkalai) oruvarukkup pin oruvaraka alittuk konte vantu avarkal anaivaraiyum (pinnullavarkal pecakkutiya) verum carittiramakki vittom. Akave, nampikkai kollata (ittakaiya) makkalukkuk ketutan
23|45|Pinnar, musavaiyum avarutaiya cakotarar harunaiyum nam vacanankalaik kontum, telivana atarankalaik kontum nam anuppinom
23|46|hpir'avnitamum avanutaiya piratanikalitamum (anuppivaittom). Avarkalo karvam kontu perumai atikkum makkalaka iruntarkal
23|47|nam'maip ponra manitarkalana (inta) iruvarai nam nampikkai kolvoma? (Atuvum) avarkalatu camukattinaro, namakku atimaikalaka irukkinranar
23|48|akave, ivviruvaraiyum poyyarena avarkal kurinarkal. Itan karanamaka avarkal alikkappattup poyinar
23|49|avarkal nerana valiyil celvatarkaka musavukku nam oru vetattaik kotuttom. (Eninum, atai avarkal porutpatuttavillai)
23|50|maryamutaiya makanaiyum avarutaiya tayaiyum nam or attatci akki avviruvaraiyum mikka celippum, nir valamum poruntiya, vacippatarku mikavum takutiyana uyariya pumiyil vacikkumpatic ceytom
